name: Tenement
description:
After a South Bronx gang take over an isolated Tenement, all hell breaks loose. The remaining residents arm themselves to take on the drug fuelled gang members. To make matters even crazier a swat team also enters the building to take out the gangs. What ensues is total carnage, a game of survival.

Tenement is an online PvP Battle Royale style game – a free-for-all deathmatch against bots and players.
